html: (2 Nephi 15:5)."Take away the hedge … and breakdown the wall." The hedge is the inner enclosure, and the wall is the stone fence or outer enclosure protecting the vineyard. The Lord is declaring that His protecting hand is being removed from the house of Israel. (See Psalm 80:12-13.) The consequences of the Lord's absence from apostate Israel are spelled out in verses 5 and 6.
